LightningBeams.name: Lightning Beam VFX
LightningBeams.description:
Procedural Lightning Effect
- Attachments based (A -> B)
- Customizable structure and animation
- Uses Lightning Beams by Quasiduck

AnimationUtil.name: Animation util
AnimationUtil.description:
- Spoof animation id
- Import from blender
- Add event to keyframe
- Flip animation on x-axis

ScreenEffects.description:
- ImpactFrames (CCE)
- CameraShake (with presets)
- Camera weld (VFX on screen)
ImpactFrames emit, others enable
ScreenEffects.name: Screen effects

Craters.name: Ground Craters
Craters.description:
Ground debris that adapts to the surface
- Supports [Ring, Cone, Line] shapes
- Supports fill, and many more options
- by @diminutives (discord)

SimpleMeshVFX.description:
A Mesh emitter with Start/End format
- Supports decal tweens & flipbooks
- MeshParts, Parts, Unions, SpecialMesh
- EmitCount, SpreadAngle, and more
SimpleMeshVFX.name: Simple Mesh VFX

Splines.name: Splines (Beziers)
Splines.description:
Move & Emit along Spline Paths
- Attachment points (1, 2, ... End)
- Customizable shape emission & Hitbox
- +Comes with Particle Path Visualizer
